page.title: 03WIDNES -INDUSTRIAL PIONEERS
page.content:
{ JOHN HUTCHINSON-1847.}He built the first factory on Spike Island. He used the lime kilns which can still be seen today.}
{ HENRY DEACON-1851.}He was manager of the chemical factory.His son,Wade Deacon founded a school in Widnes.He built his own works with Pilkington in {1853}.In{1863 WILLIAM PILKINGTON established the Mersey Chemical Works.
{ WILLIAM GOSSAGE-1855.}He set up a soap factory and made marbled soap.
{ LUDWIG MOND-1862.}He and his friend, John Brunner,worked in Northwich which is now part of I.C.I.{ { { SCOT NEIL MATHIESON-1873.}He built one of the most important works on Widnes Marsh.
